# existingItems

**Instance Property**

The array of drag items present in a drag session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var existingItems: [UIDragItem] { get }
```

## Getting the drag items

- **suggestedItems**: An array of drag items that the system provides when the text drag delegate doesn’t provide custom drag items.

items.description: An array of drag items that the system provides when the text drag delegate doesn’t provide custom drag items.
items.name: suggestedItems
